verses.text: Now in the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w fourth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of this \w month|strong="H2320"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were \w assembled|strong="H0622"\w* with \w fasting|strong="H6685"\w*, and with \w sackclothes|strong="H8242"\w*, and \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* upon them.

And the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* themselves from all \w strangers|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* and \w confessed|strong="H3034"\w* their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, and the \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 9.2 \ft strangers: Heb. strange children\f*

And they stood \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in their \w place|strong="H5977"\w*, and \w read|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add one\add* fourth \w part|strong="H7243"\w* of the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; and \add another\add* fourth \w part|strong="H7243"\w* they \w confessed|strong="H3034"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Then stood \w up|strong="H6965"\w* upon the \w stairs|strong="H4608"\w*, of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, and \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*, \w Kadmiel|strong="H6934"\w*, \w Shebaniah|strong="H7645"\w*, \w Bunni|strong="H1138"\w*, \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*, \add and\add* \w Chenani|strong="H3662"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 9.4 \ft stairs: or, scaffold\f*

Then the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, and \w Kadmiel|strong="H6934"\w*, \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*, \w Hashabniah|strong="H2813"\w*, \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, \w Hodijah|strong="H1941"\w*, \w Shebaniah|strong="H7645"\w*, \add and\add* \w Pethahiah|strong="H6611"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Stand \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \add and\add* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* be thy \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, which is \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* above all \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* and \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.

Thou, \add even\add* thou, \add art\add* \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* alone; thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* of \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, with all their \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and all \add things\add* that \add are\add* therein, the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*, and all that \add is\add* therein, and thou \w preservest|strong="H2421"\w* them all; and the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w worshippeth|strong="H7812"\w* thee.

Thou \add art\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, who didst \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w Abram|strong="H0087"\w*, and broughtest him \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Ur|strong="H0218"\w* of the \w Chaldees|strong="H3778"\w*, and \w gavest|strong="H7760"\w* him the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*;

And \w foundest|strong="H4672"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and \w madest|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with him to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, and the \w Girgashites|strong="H1622"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add it, I say\add*, to his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and hast \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*; for thou \add art\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*:

And didst \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* their \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* by the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*;

And \w shewedst|strong="H5414"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* and \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* upon \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and on all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and on all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for thou \w knewest|strong="H3045"\w* that they dealt \w proudly|strong="H2102"\w* against them. So didst thou \w get|strong="H6213"\w* thee a \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And thou didst \w divide|strong="H1234"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, so that they went \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* on the dry \w land|strong="H3004"\w*; and their \w persecutors|strong="H7291"\w* thou \w threwest|strong="H7993"\w* into the \w deeps|strong="H4688"\w*, as a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* into the \w mighty|strong="H5794"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

Moreover thou \w leddest|strong="H5148"\w* them in the \w day|strong="H3119"\w* by a \w cloudy|strong="H6051"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w*; and in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* by a \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, to give them \w light|strong="H0215"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* wherein they should \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

Thou camest \w down|strong="H3381"\w* also upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, and \w spakest|strong="H1696"\w* with them from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* them \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*, \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*:\f + \fr 9.13 \ft true…: Heb. laws of truth\f*

And madest \w known|strong="H3045"\w* unto them thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, and \w commandedst|strong="H6680"\w* them \w precepts|strong="H4687"\w*, \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*, by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*:

And \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* them \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* for their \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w*, and broughtest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for them out of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* for their \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*, and \w promisedst|strong="H0559"\w* them that they should go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which thou hadst \w sworn|strong="H3027"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them.\f + \fr 9.15 \ft which…: Heb. which thou hadst lift up thine hand to give them\f*

But they and our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* dealt \w proudly|strong="H2102"\w*, and \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* their \w necks|strong="H6203"\w*, and \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not to thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*,

And \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w obey|strong="H8085"\w*, neither were \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* of thy \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* that thou \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* among them; but \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* their \w necks|strong="H6203"\w*, and in their \w rebellion|strong="H4805"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* a \w captain|strong="H7218"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to their \w bondage|strong="H5659"\w*: but thou \add art\add* a \w God|strong="H0433"\w* ready to \w pardon|strong="H5547"\w*, \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w* and \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w*, \w slow|strong="H0750"\w* to \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w*, and \w forsookest|strong="H5800"\w* them not.\f + \fr 9.17 \ft a God…: Heb. a God of pardons\f*

Yea, when they had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* them a \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* that brought thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and had \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w provocations|strong="H5007"\w*;

Yet thou in thy \w manifold|strong="H7227"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* \w forsookest|strong="H5800"\w* them not in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: the \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from them by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, to \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* them in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; neither the \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, to shew them \w light|strong="H0215"\w*, and the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* wherein they should \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

Thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* also thy \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* to \w instruct|strong="H7919"\w* them, and \w withheldest|strong="H4513"\w* not thy \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* from their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* them \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for their \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*.

Yea, \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* didst thou \w sustain|strong="H3557"\w* them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \add so that\add* they \w lacked|strong="H2637"\w* nothing; their \w clothes|strong="H8008"\w* waxed not \w old|strong="H1086"\w*, and their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w swelled|strong="H1216"\w* not.

Moreover thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* them \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* and \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*, and didst \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* them into \w corners|strong="H6285"\w*: so they \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*.

Their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* also \w multipliedst|strong="H7235"\w* thou as the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w broughtest|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, concerning which thou hadst \w promised|strong="H0559"\w* to their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, that they should go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \add it\add*.

So the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and thou \w subduedst|strong="H3665"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* them into their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, with their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that they might \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with them as they \w would|strong="H7522"\w*.\f + \fr 9.24 \ft as they…: Heb. according to their will\f*

And they \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w strong|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and a \w fat|strong="H8082"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of all \w goods|strong="H2898"\w*, \w wells|strong="H0953"\w* \w digged|strong="H2672"\w*, \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w oliveyards|strong="H2132"\w*, and \w fruit|strong="H3978"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*: so they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and were \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*, and became \w fat|strong="H8080"\w*, and \w delighted|strong="H5727"\w* themselves in thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w*.\f + \fr 9.25 \ft wells: or, cisterns\f*\f + \fr 9.25 \ft fruit…: Heb. tree of food\f*

Nevertheless they were \w disobedient|strong="H4784"\w*, and \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* against thee, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* their \w backs|strong="H1458"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* which \w testified|strong="H5749"\w* against them to \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* them to thee, and they \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w provocations|strong="H5007"\w*.

Therefore thou \w deliveredst|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*, who \w vexed|strong="H6887"\w* them: and in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of their \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*, when they \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto thee, thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* \add them\add* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; and according to thy \w manifold|strong="H7227"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* them \w saviours|strong="H3467"\w*, who \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* them out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.

But after they had \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: therefore \w leftest|strong="H5800"\w* thou them in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, so that they had the \w dominion|strong="H7287"\w* over them: yet when they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto thee, thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* \add them\add* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w* didst thou \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* them according to thy \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*;\f + \fr 9.28 \ft they did…: Heb. they returned to do evil\f*

And \w testifiedst|strong="H5749"\w* against them, that thou mightest bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*: yet they dealt \w proudly|strong="H2102"\w*, and \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, but \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, (which if a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, he shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w* in them;) and \w withdrew|strong="H5414"\w* the \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*, and \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* their \w neck|strong="H6203"\w*, and would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.\f + \fr 9.29 \ft withdrew…: Heb. they gave a withdrawing shoulder\f*

Yet \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* didst thou \w forbear|strong="H4900"\w* them, and \w testifiedst|strong="H5749"\w* against them by thy \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*: yet would they not give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*: therefore \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* thou them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 9.30 \ft forbear…: Heb. protract over them\f*\f + \fr 9.30 \ft in thy…: Heb. in the hand of thy prophets\f*

Nevertheless for thy \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w mercies’|strong="H7356"\w* sake thou \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* not utterly \w consume|strong="H3617"\w* them, nor \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* them; for thou \add art\add* a \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w* and \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

Now therefore, our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, and the \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, who \w keepest|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, let not all the \w trouble|strong="H8513"\w* seem \w little|strong="H4591"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, that hath \w come|strong="H4672"\w* upon us, on our \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, on our \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and on our \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and on our \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and on our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and on all thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, since the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 9.32 \ft trouble: Heb. weariness\f*\f + \fr 9.32 \ft that…: Heb. that hath found us\f*

Howbeit thou \add art\add* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* in all that is \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* upon us; for thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w right|strong="H0571"\w*, but we have done \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*:

Neither have our \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, our \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, our \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, nor our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, nor \w hearkened|strong="H7181"\w* unto thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and thy \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w*, wherewith thou didst \w testify|strong="H5749"\w* against them.

For they have not \w served|strong="H5647"\w* thee in their \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, and in thy \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w* that thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* them, and in the \w large|strong="H7342"\w* and \w fat|strong="H8082"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, neither \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* they from their \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w works|strong="H4611"\w*.

Behold, we \add are\add* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \add for\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* unto our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof and the \w good|strong="H2898"\w* thereof, behold, we \add are\add* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* in it:

And it yieldeth \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* unto the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* whom thou hast \w set|strong="H5414"\w* over us because of our \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*: also they have \w dominion|strong="H4910"\w* over our \w bodies|strong="H1472"\w*, and over our \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, at their \w pleasure|strong="H7522"\w*, and we \add are\add* in \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*.

And because of all this we \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w sure|strong="H0548"\w* \add covenant\add*, and \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \add it;\add* and our \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add and\add* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w seal|strong="H2856"\w* \add unto it\add*.\f + \fr 9.38 \ft seal: Heb. are at the sealing, or, sealed\f*
